item.description: Assignment 0 (Due 28/01/2019) 0.1 Positron, a fundamental anti-particle predicted by Dirac, has a mass that is same as that of electron ($m_e$) but it has an opposite charge ($+e$). Positrons are emitted by Flouride-18 and used in commercial imaging for patients. Positronium is an analogue to hydrogen atom where the proton is substituted by a positron. Choose a coordinate system of your choice and a) Write down the non-relativistic Hamiltonian for positronium, b) Sketch a qualitative distribution of positronic and electronic wavefunctions, and c) Will this system be stable?
